options.content:
# Overview

This dashboard displays key metrics for how Virtual Agents are performing across different projects.

It is possible to filter based on organisation and project. The tables here show a mapping between organisationName -> organisationId and projectName -> projectId.

# Compatibility
This dashboard requires version 4.47.0 of Cognigy.AI to work.

panels.description: Messages Processed within the specified interval per Project
panels.title: Messages Processed / Interval

panels.description: 90th Quantile of Message Processing Time per Project
panels.title: Message Processing Time (90th Percentile)

panels.description: Heatmap of Message Processing Time per Project
panels.title: Message Processing Time

options.content:
# Knowledge AI

The Knowledge AI feature was introduced as part of Cognigy.AI v4.57.0 as part of a private-beta. The feature might not be enabled on your Cognigy.AI system.

panels.description: Total Search Requests  per Organization Id per Project Id
panels.title: Search Requests Total

panels.description: Search Requests  per Interval / Organization Id / Project Id
panels.title: Search Requests / Interval

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(cognigy_nlp_classifier_score_rpc_latency_histogram_milliseconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", projectId=~"$projectId"}[1m])) by (le, container, organisationId, projectId))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(cognigy_nlp_classifier_train_rpc_latency_histogram_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", projectId=~"$projectId"}[1m])) by (le, container, organisationId, projectId))

panels.description: Endpoint Transformer Processing Time (90th Percentile) per Project
panels.title: Endpoint Transformer Processing Time (90th Percentile)

panels.description: How often are extensions being used per Project.
panels.title: Functions Usage Total

panels.description: Functions Usage per Interval per Project.
panels.title: Functions Usage / Interval

panels.description: HTTP Status Code Events rate per minute
panels.title: HTTP Status Code Events/min Rate

panels.description: Percentile graphs of HTTP Requests Latency made by HTTP Request nodes
panels.title: HTTP Requests Latency 90th Percentile

panels.description: Heatmap of HTTP Requests Latency made by HTTP Request nodes for a particular Project
panels.title: HTTP Requests Latency
